name: Frederick Agyemang
bio: Frederick leads the Africa Bureau of Education with expertise in education policy and curriculum development. He is the principal investigator of the CCSP research.

name: Bismark Agyei
bio: Bismark manages the technical aspects of the CCSP project and oversees administrative functions within the bureau.

name: Benedicta Woode
bio: Benedicta oversees implementation of CCSP across institutions and manages stakeholder coordination.

name: Samuel Kofi Fosuhene
bio: Samuel specializes in curriculum design and educational standards with focus on career-aligned learning.

name: Nana Ama Browne Klutse
bio: Nana provides oversight on research methodologies and ensures academic rigor of all publications.

name: Alexander Kojo Nyarko
bio: Alexander advises on policy integration and works with government agencies on CCSP adoption.

name: Seth Oku Asamoah
bio: Seth develops and delivers teacher training programs for CCSP implementation.
